sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, Grid } from '@mui/material';
import EventIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Event';
import PeopleIcon from '@mui/icons-material/People';
import NotificationsActiveIcon from '@mui/icons-material/NotificationsActive';
import './Sidebar.css';

const Sidebar = () => {
  return (
    <Box className="sidebar">
      <Box sx={{ padding: '2rem' }}>
        <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ color: 'white', mb: 4 }}>
          Event Management Made Simple
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: 'white', mb: 6 }}>
          Create, Manage and Track events with our feature platform
        </Typography>

        <Grid container spacing={2} sx={{ marginTop: '2rem' }}>
          <Grid item xs={12} className="feature-item">
            <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 2 }}>
              <EventIcon sx={{ color: 'white', mr: 2 }} />
              <Box>
                <Typography variant="subtitle1" sx={{ color: 'white', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
                  Easy Event Creation
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: 'white' }}>
                  Create beautiful event pages in minutes
                </Typography>
              </Box>
            </Box>
          </Grid>

          <Grid item xs={12} className="feature-item">
            <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 2 }}>
              <PeopleIcon sx={{ color: 'white', mr: 2 }} />
              <Box>
                <Typography variant="subtitle1" sx={{ color: 'white', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
                  Guests
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: 'white' }}>
                  Easily manage guests lists and RSVPs
                </Typography>
              </Box>
            </Box>
          </Grid>

          <Grid item xs={12} className="feature-item">
            <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 2 }}>
              <NotificationsActiveIcon sx={{ color: 'white', mr: 2 }} />
              <Box>
                <Typography variant="subtitle1" sx={{ color: 'white', fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
                  Real-Time Updates
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: 'white' }}>
                  Get instant notifications for RSVPs
                </Typography>
              </Box>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Sidebar;
